androidx.slice

Class Slice

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.slice.Slice

  • public final class Slice
extends java.lang.Object
    A slice is a piece of app content and actions that can be surfaced outside of the app.

    They are constructed using TemplateSliceBuilders in a tree structure that provides the OS some information about how the content should be displayed.

public static Slice bindSlice(Context context,

        Parameters:
